============================================

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: register

.. py:function:: paginator_number(cl, i)

   Generate an individual page index link in a paginated list.


.. py:function:: pagination(cl)

   Generate the series of links to the pages in a paginated list.


.. py:function:: pagination_tag(parser, token)

.. py:function:: result_headers(cl)

   Generate the list column headers.


.. py:function:: items_for_result(cl, result, form)

   Generate the actual list of data.


.. py:class:: ResultList(form, *items)

   Bases: :py:obj:`list`


   Wrapper class used to return items in a list_editable changelist, annotated
   with the form object for error reporting purposes. Needed to maintain
   backwards compatibility with existing admin templates.


   .. py:attribute:: form


.. py:function:: results(cl)

.. py:function:: result_hidden_fields(cl)

.. py:function:: result_list(cl)

   Display the headers and data list together.


.. py:function:: result_list_tag(parser, token)

.. py:function:: date_hierarchy(cl)

   Display the date hierarchy for date drill-down functionality.


.. py:function:: date_hierarchy_tag(parser, token)

.. py:function:: search_form(cl)

   Display a search form for searching the list.


.. py:function:: search_form_tag(parser, token)

.. py:function:: admin_list_filter(cl, spec)

.. py:function:: admin_actions(context)

   Track the number of times the action field has been rendered on the page,
   so we know which value to use.


.. py:function:: admin_actions_tag(parser, token)

.. py:function:: change_list_object_tools_tag(parser, token)

   Display the row of change list object tools.
